steps.name: I am on the insurance "Dealer Portal" page

elements.name: <1> Check for vehicle cover with valid vehicle registration no

steps.name: I enter valid vehicle registration no "OV12UYY"
I click on the find vehicle button
the vehicle "Cover start:  09 FEB 2022 : 16 : 26" and "Cover end:    18 FEB 2022 : 23 : 59" dates should be displayed
I am on the insurance "Dealer Portal" page

elements.name: 2 Check for vehicle cover with invalid vehicle registration no

steps.name: I enter valid vehicle registration no "sdsdsdfs"
I click on the find vehicle button
the valid error message "Sorry record not found" should be displayed
I am on the insurance "Dealer Portal" page

elements.name: 3 Check for vehicle cover with invalid vehicle registration no

steps.name: I enter valid vehicle registration no "1234"
I click on the find vehicle button
the valid error message "Sorry record not found" should be displayed
I am on the insurance "Dealer Portal" page

elements.name: 4 Check for vehicle cover with invalid vehicle registration no

steps.name: I enter valid vehicle registration no "as56as"
I click on the find vehicle button
the valid error message "Sorry record not found" should be displayed
I am on the insurance "Dealer Portal" page

elements.name: 5 Check for vehicle cover with invalid vehicle registration no

steps.name: I enter valid vehicle registration no ""
I click on the find vehicle button
the valid error message "Please enter a valid car registration" should be displayed

arguments.val: Please enter a valid car registration

steps.name: I am on the insurance "Dealer Portal" page
I click on the volkswagen financial services link
the "Volkswagen Insurance Portal" page should be displayed

name: Drive Away Insurance
description:
Description:As a user of the insurance portal when I enter vehicle registration no in the dealer portal page it should display
vehicle cover start and end dates

steps.name: I am on the insurance "Dealer Portal" page
I click on the volkswagen financial services link
the "Volkswagen Insurance Portal" page should be displayed
I am on the "Volkswagen Insurance Portal" page
I click on the "Approved Used Warranty" under home
the sub link detail "Approved Used Warranty"  should be displayed

the "Volkswagen Insurance Portal" page should be displayed

I click on the "Ensurance" under home
the sub link detail "Ensurance"  should be displayed

I click on the "Home" under home

the "Volkswagen Insurance Portal" page should be displayed
